ModMetaData.name: Norse Weapons
ModMetaData.author: Metalocif
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds a few legendary weapons from Norse myth to Rimworld. - Mjolnir, a powerful hammer that can call down lightning strikes. - Gungnir, a spear that stuns in melee combat. - Hofund, a sword that knocks back its targets. - Laevateinn, a dagger that sets its targets on fire. - Gleipnir, chains that prevent its targets from attacking. The weapons have no quality, no hit points, and are balanced around Royalty ultratech weapons. They can only be acquired through quests and looting. This was commissioned by Ant on the Rimworld Mod Market Discord server.
